shortcuts.description:
**Phone IDs:**
{phone_ids}

Copy the ID for your device - you'll need it when setting up the shortcut on your iPhone/iPad.

The service `iphone_alarms_sync.sync_alarms` is available. You can create a shortcut that calls this service with your phone_id and alarms data.
